channel.title: Need help concerning Runserver.bat
channel.description:
Right so i used to have a server but i have a new computer now so i was going to make a new one I put this in compile.bat
@echo off COLOR 08 title hello compiler "D:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
I checked my runserver.bat before i did this and it worked. I then tried the runserver again and it didnt work. It opens and instantly closes without me seeing what the error was. Could someone please tell me how to sort it out, if you need more info please ask.

item.title: Need help concerning Runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
Try that in runserver

@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
And that in compile

Read full topic

item.title: Need help concerning Runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @Spicer001 Spicer001
item.description:
@Spicer001 wrote:

Still didnt make my runserver.bat work, thanks for tryint though.

Can anyone else help?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help concerning Runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

@echo off
color 0c
title Client Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac" *.java
pause

that should work. replace it with that ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Need help concerning Runserver.bat
